description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. Saturn 9 is a sci-fi horror adventure where you are sent to investigate a spaceship after all communication is lost.  Solve puzzles and explore the ship to uncover the mystery of what happened to the crew.
description.short: Saturn 9 is a sci-fi horror adventure where you are sent to investigate a spaceship after all communication is lost.  Solve puzzles and explore the ship to uncover the mystery of what happened to the crew.
